chest.name: Deadly Brew
chest.desc: When you inflict any other poison on a target, you also inflict [Deadly Poison](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/item=2892/deadly-poison).

chest.name: Just a Flesh Wound
chest.desc: You take 20% reduced Physical damage while Blade Dance is active. Additionally, you have 6% reduced chance to be critically hit by melee attacks, the threat generated by all your actions is massively increased, and your [Feint](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=1966/feint) ability is replaced with Tease, which Taunts the target to attack you.

chest.name: Quick Draw
chest.desc: Draw your ranged weapon and fire a quick shot at an enemy, causing normal ranged weapon damage and reducing the target's movement sped by 50% for 6 sec. Awards 1 combo point.
bullets: Quick Draw benefits from all talents and effects that trigger from or modify Sinister Strike.

chest.name: Slaughter from the Shadows
chest.desc: Reduces the Energy cost of your [Backstab](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=53/backstab) and [Ambush](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=8676/ambush) abilities by 20. Does not apply to Mutilate.

glove.name: Mutilate
glove.desc: Instantly attacks with both weapons for 100% weapon damage plus an additional 20 with each weapon. Damage is increased by 20% against Poisoned targets. Awards 2 combo points.
bullets: Mutilate benefits from all talents and effects that trigger from or modify [Backstab](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=53/backstab) unless otherwise specified.

glove.name: Shadow Strike
glove.desc: Teleport behind your target and strike, causing 150% weapon damage to the target. Must be [stealthed](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=1784/stealth). Awards 1 combo point.

glove.name: Saber Slash
glove.desc: Viciously Slash an enemy for 130% weapon damage, and cause the target to bleed for 11 damage every 2 sec for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times. Awards 1 combo point.
bullets: Saber Slash benefits from all talents and effects that trigger from or modify Sinister Strike.

glove.name: Shiv
glove.desc: Instantly attack with your off-hand weapon to deal normal off-hand weapon damage with a 100% chance to apply the poison from your off-hand weapon to the target. Slower weapons require more energy. Awards 1 combo point. Shiv benefits from all talents and effects that trigger from or modify [Sinister Strike](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=1752/sinister-strike).

glove.name: Main Gauche
glove.desc: Instantly strike with your off-hand weapon for normal off-hand weapon damage and increase your chance to parry by 10% for 10 sec. Awards 1 combo point.
bullets: Saber Slash benefits from all talents and effects that trigger from or modify [Sinister Strike](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=1752/sinister-strike).

leg.name: Between the Eyes
leg.desc: Ranged Finishing move that causes damage per combo point, increased by Attack Power, and stuns the target:

leg.name: Blade Dance
leg.desc: Finishing move that increases your [Parry](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=3127/parry) chance. Lasts longer and grants more [Parry](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/spell=3127/parry) chance per combo point:

leg.name: Envenom
leg.desc: Finishing move that deals instant poison damage based on your [Deadly Poison](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/item=2892/deadly-poison) doses on the target. Following the Envenom attack you have a 75% increased frequency of applying [Instant Poison](https://www.wowhead.com/classic/item=6947/instant-poison) for 1 sec plus an additional 1 sec per combo point. One dose is activated per combo point:
